EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM CI on the Cloud with Jenkins, Spring and Cloud Foundry.Confirmat
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: CI on the Cloud with Jenkins, Spring and Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar CI on the Cloud with Jenkins, Spring and Cloud Foundry with Jamie O'Meara. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, June 23, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Europe: 3:00pm GMT Summer Time (London, GMT+01:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=ea5ae92b6b7cb142cb6fc5e87d0a07e44> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 664 623 864 Thank you,
